onbon.y2

Class Y2ResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • onbon.y2.Y2ResourceManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Y2UploadManager, Y2UploadSimulator

    public abstract class Y2ResourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The resource manager provides functions to upload materials such as images, fonts, etc. to the Y2.
    Author:
    ONBON
